title: I like when URF was just URF
body:
URF, I liked the fanfare when you appeared. (cried tears of unbridled joy, confused the hell out of me)
I loved how it played.
I was amazed at having no CD.


Then one day...Riot in their infinite wisdom, decided "change is always good!"

BUT...Riot just loves throwing gamemodes under busses, then scraping off the fucked up remains, throwing that into a  blender...remoulding it/remaking it and throwing it under a bus again then and pouring gasoline on it.

And this version...oh lord.

Riot, you done fucking goofed this one. 
It's like a clickbait for new players who never felt the awesomeness of the original URF.
